name: W4RR-i/o-RS
summary: Semi-automatic micro-sandbox with a console interface. You decide the fates, but don't see anything actually going on. Imagine your purpose is just to simulate a human's decision making system, in a lack of information beyond the spreadsheet numbers.

name: W4RR-i/o-RS: Descent
summary: Mini JRPG-like battles with a console interface.
